i
Dr. Harry J. Skornia
University of Illinois
Urbana, Ill.
Dear Harry:
I have your note of June 5 concerning the Television Study.
Apparently somebody has leaked details of this to the Press or
the Congressional Committee investigating juvenile delinquency.
The New York papers have already carried a great deal of the
results of the Study. I would, however, ask you to send us
30 copies and we will release, roughly, for June 23.
I will send a preliminary release to Miss Howard in accordance
with your suggestion.
I will do the best I can on the Scholarship situation.
With all best wishes,
/
As ever,
Seymour N. Siegel
Director
